description.en: Kingdom of Loathing (abbreviated KoL) is a browser-based multiplayer role-playing game designed and operated by Asymmetric Publications
description.ga_IE: Is cluiche il-imreora il-imreora atá bunaithe ar bhrabhsálaí é Ríocht Mhuineacháin (KOL giorraithe) atá deartha agus oibriú ag foilseacháin neamhshiméadracha
